name: Work One
txt: I'm reviving sites and applications with the latest technologies with the tendency to always try new technologies and their capabilities. Besides building new, I am also reviving websites and applications.
short-desc: Lorem Ipsum based in Belgrade, Serbia. Have several years of experience in various spheres of design and programming. I am currently working as a Web Designer and Developer in the Netops corporation where is my passion for design and programming is merged.
